lang.fr.validation.after: The {_attribute} field must be a date after {_date}.
lang.fr.validation.after_or_equal: The {_attribute} field must be a date that is less than or equal to {_date}.
lang.fr.validation.alpha: The {_attribute} field must contain only letters.
lang.fr.validation.alpha_dash: The {_attribute} field must contain only letters, numbers, and dashes.
lang.fr.validation.alpha_num: The {_attribute} field must contain only numbers and letters.
lang.fr.validation.array: The {_attribute} field must be a table.
lang.fr.validation.ascii: The {_attribute} field must contain only alphanumeric characters and single-byte encoded symbols.
lang.fr.validation.before: The {_attribute} field must be a date prior to {_date}.
lang.fr.validation.before_or_equal: The {_attribute} field must be a date before or equal to {_date}.
lang.fr.validation.phone: The {_attribute} field must be a valid phone number.

between.array: The {_attribute} array must contain between {_min} and {_max} elements.
between.file: The file size of {_attribute} must be between {_min} and {_max} kilobytes.
between.numeric: The value of {_attribute} must be between {_min} and {_max}.
between.string: The {_attribute} text must be between {_min} and {_max} characters.

lang.fr.validation.date_format: The {_attribute} field does not match the {_format} format.
lang.fr.validation.decimal: The {_attribute} field must have {_decimal} decimal places.
lang.fr.validation.declined_if: The {_attribute} field should be declined when {_other} is set to {_value}.
lang.fr.validation.different: The {_attribute} and {_other} fields must be different.
lang.fr.validation.digits_between: The {_attribute} field must contain between {_min} and {_max} digits.
lang.fr.validation.dimensions: The size of the {_attribute} image is not compliant.
lang.fr.validation.distinct: The {_attribute} field has a duplicate value.

lang.fr.validation.email: The {_attribute} field must be a valid email address.

lang.fr.validation.file: The {_attribute} field must be a file.
lang.fr.validation.filled: The {_attribute} field must have a value.

gt.array: The {_attribute} array must contain more than {_value} items.
gt.file: The file size of {_attribute} must be greater than {_value} kilobytes.
gt.numeric: The value of {_attribute} must be greater than {_value}.
gt.string: The {_attribute} text must contain more than {_value} characters.

gte.file: The file size of {_attribute} must be greater than or equal to {_value} kilobytes.
gte.numeric: The value of {_attribute} must be greater than or equal to {_value}.
gte.string: The {_attribute} text must contain at least {_value} characters.

lang.fr.validation.image: The {_attribute} field must be an image.
lang.fr.validation.in_array: The {_attribute} field does not exist in {_other}.

lte.string: The {_attribute} text must contain no more than {_value} characters.

min.array: The {_attribute} array must contain at least {_min} elements.

min.numeric: The value of {_attribute} must be greater than or equal to {_min}.
min.string: The text in {_attribute} must contain at least {_min} characters.

lang.fr.validation.min_digits: The {_attribute} field must have at least {_min} digits.

lang.fr.validation.numeric: The {_attribute} field must contain a number.

password.letters: The {_attribute} field must contain at least one letter.

password.numbers: The {_attribute} field must contain at least one digit.
password.symbols: The {_attribute} field must contain at least one symbol.

lang.fr.validation.required_without: The {_attribute} field is required when {_values} is not present.
lang.fr.validation.required_without_all: The {_attribute} field is required when none of {_values} is present.

size.string: The text in {_attribute} must contain {_size} characters.
